text: Background fan noise is present but speech remains intelligible. Street traffic rises while the speaker confirms checkpoint alpha. A keyboard clatter appears and the transcript should stay stable. The channel briefly clips, then recovers without dropping words. Final noisy segment confirms robustness under layered interference.
